title: I'm sick to death of going vs 5 mans every single game.
body:
I play League casually by myself and literally every game I get vs a premade and I just lose because they have synergy.
fix matchmaking pls.

replies.body: im sick of getting team mates who give up too easily

Honestly, it doesn't really matter that much. I assume you are talking about Blind and if that is the case you are not really losing anything, you are not going down in rank or losing LP. Its just a loss and you might get a bit tilted that's all. You still gain exp and honor whether you win or lose.

I also don't see how playing against a 5 man premade is much different then playing against non-premade. If your team has good map awareness and communication within chat and pings you will do fine.

Again if it is just norms it doesn't hurt anyone.
